question: Question 1. What use conditions(restrictions) apply to this data?
Question 2. An access request need to include the following:
answers: name of PI and host organisation
contact details (including name and email of the requester)
scientific purpose of data access request
commitment to inform when the data has been used in a publication
commitment not to host or share the data outside the requesting organisation
statement of non-commercial use of data

question: Question 3. In addition, the requester needs to provide:
answers: an agreement to Terms and Conditions
text_in_statement: upon completion of our user agreement
upon completion of our terms and conditions
if all conditions are fulfilled, you will then be able to download the data
